results.headline: Review: In ‘The Lego Batman Movie,’ Toys and Heroes, What’s Not to Like?
results.summary_short: Warner Bros. offers amusement at its own expense and Will Arnett gives great voice to Gotham’s brooder, but this new movie is still a commercial.

link.suggested_link_text: Read the New York Times Review of The Lego Batman Movie

results.display_title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
results.headline: Review: ‘Batman v Superman’ ... v Fun?
results.summary_short: The film, pitting Ben Affleck against Henry Cavill, largely serves as an extended trailer for a slate of coming DC Comics movies like “Wonder Woman.”

results.headline: Falling for the Anarchy She Was Sent to Fight
results.summary_short: A group of anarchists near the Mason-Dixon line are determined to hold the poisoners and polluters of the executive class accountable for their actions.

results.headline: The Guru in the Basement Promises a Journey to ... Something
results.summary_short: A young couple go undercover to investigate an enigmatic woman leading what may be a cult in “Sound of My Voice.”

results.headline: Stealing Glances
